function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Population density in urban green spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underestimation of ecosystemic services in urban design and environmental management","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Notable increase in the use of nature-related cell-phone applications, such as birdwatching apps","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting face-to-face surveys during a pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to green spaces during a pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact on private investment in green roofs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation in built environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost and maintenance needs discourage green roof installation.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Confinement conditions impact perception and willingness to pay for green areas.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on perception of green spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistency in drivers for wtp for green roofs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparing both models, the only two variables in common are the number of inhabitants under 12 and the relative contribution to the household income.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"It is interesting to notice how the wtp for a large green roof in portugal builds up on the wtp for a smaller one and the availability to pay more for a larger one.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Educational level, household inhabitants, and other socio-economic factors found to be statistically significant in the model for the wtp for a larger green roof in other countries.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multinomial logistic regression model developed due to violation of proportional odds assumption in ordinal regression model.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant difference in accuracy of models for portugal and other countries in wtp analysis.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variables statistically significant in the model for wtp for a medium size accessible green roof.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of confinement on green spaces perception","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistically significant predictors for wtp of a larger green roof","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Statistically aggregated variables to reduce categories","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between household income and wtp for green roofs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of statistically significant effects of green space awareness and availability on wtp","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Widespread knowledge of green roofs","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost and maintenance concerns","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to green areas may impact mental well-being and physical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Access to green areas during and after confinement","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Willingness to pay for green
